lines.text: I am not losing my daughter to a God-damned, nine-hundred-year-old goat-head!
Oh, goody, we're going for a ride!
Ooo, these vegetables smell good! These all come from my brother's garden. I get you good price, of course. He uses fresh turkey manure. Turkey manure is the very best; gives you the best crop.

[Just before he shoots the doll]
Play with this, bitch!
